Marbach 12Th SUNDAY IN ORDINARY TIME JUNE 25 2017 YRA From the Pastors Desk WE ARE INVITED TO BE WITNESS OF GOD AND NEVER FEAR My dear brothers and sisters in Christ in the name of the Lord Jesus I peace with you all I am back from my Annual Priests Retreat at Angola It all went well and thanks to God I prayed each of you and all your loved ones Thanks for your own prayers for me Remember that Tuesday June 27 2017 my home Bishop Most Rev Hilary Paul Okeke will celebrate the Holy Mass for and with us The Holy Mass starts by 6:00pm and party starts after Mass about 6:30pm It is POT LUCK PARTY Everybody is invited We all are invited by God to be witnesses As witnesses of God and the Lord Jesus Christ and of our faith we must not fear In the 1st Reading Jer 201013 Prophet Jeremiah witnessed without fear The mys tery of Kingdom of God can only be known by the witness of those who are committed with their faith Who are they It you and me All of us So Jeremiah despite the plot of the enemies of God and faith denounced evil without fear That is what we are called to do Listen to what Jeremiah said about those who wanted to kill him because he op posed their evil way of life Yes I hear the whispering of many Terror on every side Denounce him Let us denounce Jeremiah was frightened by his enemies but he remained steadfast in telling the truth witnessing to Gods commandment God came to his rescue and he said Sing to the Lord for he has rescued the life of the poor from the power of the wicked You see God always come to the help of his messengers In the 2nd Reading Rom 51215St Paul explained to us how sin and dearth entered the world If by one mans sin everyone sinned and thus death by one Mans obedi ence grace entered the world and by that grace we gain life we shall not be afraid of death For Christ has conquered sin and death So do not be afraid to bear witness for God and the Lord Jesus Christ In the Gospel Mt 102633 The Lord Jesus Himself assured us of his support He said to the 12 Apostles and to us Fear no one what you hear whispered proclaim on the housetops And do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul rather be afraid of the one who can destroy both body and soul in Gehenna That is in hell So what you need to fear is sin for it destroys both body and soul in hell Gods protection is assured as said in the Gospel Are not sparrows sold for a small coin Yet not one of them falls to the ground without your Fathers knowledge So do not be afraid you are worth more than many sparrows You see You hear that Let us trust God and do Gods worl well and He will protect us and save God bless you Msgr Pius Ilechukwu Remember Heaven is for us all I hope you are doing something about it SCRIPTUREMASS READINGS FOR THE WEEK Mt 8517 Sun July 2 Thirteenth Sunday in Ordinary Time 2 Kgs 48111416a Rom 63 4811 Mt 103742 Scatter seeds of kindness everywhere you go Scatter bits of courtesy watch them grow and grow Gather buds of friendship keep them till fullblown You will find more happiness than you have ever known AMY RAABE The amount needed each week to make budget is 511640 We are 32065 ahead of budget from last week Encoun ter watch for details Sat Nov 11St Joseph CCW 4th Annual Bazaar 9a3p ALL DAY ADORATION EXPOSITION OF THE BLESSED SACRAMENT AT ST JOSEPH BLUFFTON Thursday July 6 2017 830am 7:00pm Evening Prayer 6:30pm Litany of the Eucharist Benediction 6:45pm Mass 7:00pm Please sign up on the sheet in the narthex if you plan to come and spend an hour with Jesus in the Blessed Sacra ment This helps us plan the day making sure Jesus is not left alone while exposed on the altar Thank you From Death To New Life In your charity please pray for the repose of the soul of Larry Dustman husband of JoAnn Dustman died June 14 2017 May God welcome him home Fill him with peace and bless those who will miss him Eternal Rest Grant unto him Lord and let Perpetual light shine upon him May his souls and the souls of all the faithful departed through the mercy of God rest in Peace Amen VACATION BIBLE SCHOOL BEGINS TONIGHT SUNDAY JUNE 25 THURSDAY JUNE 29 CARRYINPOOL PARTY FRIDAY JUNE 30 PETERS PENCE COLLECTION Today we will have a second collection for Peters Pence Thank you in advance for your generous donations to the Peters Pence Collection PILGRIMAGE TOUR ANNOUNCED Pilgrimage Tour for the 100th Anniversary of The Apparitions of Fatima Tour includes round trip airfare from Chicago lodging at luxury class hotels ground transportation in a deluxe motor coach two daily meals tour guide fees entrance fees into all sites along with tips taxes and gratuity For more details and a packet of infor mation please contact Erika Piotrowski at (231)720-8378 or email at erikapeurohotmail.com PARISH PICNIC Our Parish Picnic this year will be Sunday Sep tember 10 at Roush Park 925 Silver Street Bluffton This is the usual start date for Religious Education classesSunday School the Sunday after Labor Day since the Parish Picnic was scheduled for this date we will begin Religious Education classesSunday School the following Sunday September 17th Please watch the bulle tin for details about the picnicsignup sheet and also for information regarding Religious Ed Sunday School classes Thank you
